name: Lainchan Solarized
description: A solarized version of lainchan, made to fit my theme.
additional_info: - Make sure to select the theme "Dark Green" before installing. - Add this line of code to the top of your css after installing*: @import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans); ------------------------------------ v1.1 - Minor improvements *Userstyles is furrrarking stupid and doesn't let users submit code that imports anything.
